title: Number 100
content:
Hi all,

I need some suggestions about the number “100”.  
I already read similar post but can remember any with the number “100”. Made a search and did not found anything...  
I’m preparing a logo for a company that makes 100 years next year.  
So I’m looking for a typeface for the “100”.  
I want a “classic look”, “strong” (bold?), “straith” not italic, sans or not...  
I made some test and these are is “my results”...  
Any suggestions?

Thanks in advance  
António

comments.content:
Hi António,

how big will it be displayed? You’ve set your examples at a size where all of them look a little bit blunt, to me. There are display versions of Bodoni, Arno and Chaparral that would have some more character.  
F

Florian,

Thanks for the suggestion. I really enjoy better Arno Display...

“how big will it be displayed?”  
Well...not shure yet, but not big. Only in catalogues and some ceramic pieces (gifts...etc).

António

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013104306im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/100a_3657.jpg)

If it is 100 years it must be real classic.  
I would use Arno or Bodoni the others are not much classical.
